metadata.purpose: Governs how AI agents document and track the development of the Omega Ecosystem itself.

dev_mode_framework.core_directive: When the user invokes "DEV Mode", the agent is acting as an architect modifying the Omega framework (Constitution, Store, or Tools). The documentation workspace shifts exclusively to the **"Omega DEV BUILD"** directory. Do NOT store development logs in USER SPACE.

rule.instruction: Do not append endless updates to a single giant markdown file.
rule.requirement: Every time an update, test, or evaluation is made, create a **NEW** markdown file inside the relevant folder.
rule.naming_convention: Filename MUST include the version number and a short description (e.g., `v10.1.0_testing_loop.md`).

rule.instruction: When the user asks you to "log something", you are writing a Changelog entry.
rule.action: Create a new file in `Omega DEV BUILD/Changle Log/` (e.g., `v10.x.x_feature_update.md`).
rule.content: State the exact version, list the modified files, describe the feature added or bug fixed, and provide a 1-sentence summary.

rule.instruction: When assessing architecture, UX, security, or codebase health.
rule.action: Create a new file in `Omega DEV BUILD/Evaluations/`.
rule.content: Detail the strengths, weaknesses, remaining gaps, and assign an objective score.

rule.instruction: When designing a new feature before writing the code.
rule.action: Create a new file in `Omega DEV BUILD/Implementations/`.
rule.content: Map out the data flow, the exact files that will need to be touched, and the end-to-end plan.

rule.instruction: When verifying that a fix or new feature works.
rule.action: Create a new file in `Omega DEV BUILD/Testing/`.
rule.content: Document the test steps taken, the expected outcome, and the actual confirmed outcome.

workflow.step: User says: "I want to work in DEV Mode to build X"
Agent reads `DEV_MODE.xml` to understand the logging locations.
Agent creates an Implementation plan in `Implementations/`.
Agent creates a Test report in `Testing/`.
Agent creates a final Changelog entry in `Changle Log/` with the new version number.
